text: Francesc "Tito" Vilanova Bayó (17 September 1968 – 25 April 2014) was a Spanish footballer and manager. He played as a central midfielder for, and later managed, FC Barcelona. He retired in 2013 because of his ill health. He was born in Bellcaire d'Empordà, Catalonia. He won the treble with Barcelona in his first season, the 2008-09 season. This means he won La Liga, the Copa del Rey, and the UEFA Champions League. Vilanova died on 25 April 2014 due to complications from throat cancer in a hospital in Barcelona, aged 45. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1968 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:Deaths from throat cancer Category:Spanish football managers Category:Footballers from Catalonia Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Barcelona managers
title: Tito Vilanova
